Cedant: The New India Assurance Co. Ltd.
Perils_Covered: Natural Calamity (Flood, Cloud Burst, Earthquake, Landslides), Fire, Explosion, Machinery Breakdown (including damage to turbines, stator/rotor windings, guide blades, transformers, control panels, pipe joint failures leading to water inundation), Terrorist Threats, Attacks & Sabotage, Bomb Threat, Bomb Explosion, Disruption in Power Supply, Cyber Attack
Main_Activities: Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works (Tunnel Spillway, Adit to GOC, GOC Gate Shaft, Inlet Bellmouth, Outlet Concrete Dyke and Energy Dissipation Arrangement) for Teesta-V Power Station.
Proposed_Terms_Conditions: Letter of Acceptance for Package-6, Modification of Diversion Tunnel into Tunnel Spillway Arrangement - Civil & HM Works for Teesta-V Power Station, Sikkim. Total contract value INR 2,399,764,065.00. Bidder (Patel Engineering Limited) is directed to contact Head of Project, Teesta-V Power Station, NHPC Limited to take over work site and commence Works immediately. Duplicate copy of Letter of Acceptance to be signed and stamped as proof of acknowledgement and confirmation.
